website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, moisturizing hair mask good for those with fine, dry hair.
pros: Notice a difference after the first use
Lightweight and doesn't leave a residue in hair
cons: Floral scent is too overpowering for some

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: The silk express is good, the smell is overwhelming like violets , not great but it does the job, thick blond hair in humid Florida, my hair is soft and silkier, but the original it’s a 10 does the same without the smell
customer_reviews.author: tracie

customer_reviews.title: This has been a good product for me
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good product for me. I have hair length below my shoulders and granted your not getting a lot of product for the dollar amount. So what I do is use this on the ends and regular conditioner on the scalp area. I'm able to use it sparingly and make it last longer. I love the honeysuckle fragrance, if you don't care for the smell of honeysuckle this will not be a good purchase for you.
customer_reviews.author: SweetVioletRides

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair silky as promised
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work as promised. Makes hair super silky! I've tried lots of different masks, including more expensive salon ones, as well as others by It's a 10 and I always come back to this one. I'm hoping with more use it will continue to repair my now very dry and heat damaged hair. Some people have commented on the smell. I think it smells good. It is sort of perfum-y and strong, but once it's rinsed out its way more subtle. I like the smell of the original a little better but this one works way better so I'd never switch back. Price is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: It's A 10 really is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my very damaged hair! I've bleached my hair, colored and re-bleached more times than I can even count anymore. I had dreadlocks and brushed them out after several months. I didn't think it was possible for my hair to grow below my shoulders anymore because it was so damaged. I tried several different salon products from Thermafuse to Kenra to Paul Mitchell, etc. nothing has worked as well as It's A 10 and my hair is now the longest it has been in 7 years!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Opp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer but strong smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love It’s a 10 products. I ordered this by mistake which I was aiming for the original mask. While I love the moisturizer feeling in our hair when showering and then drying etc. it’s a great product! But my daughters and I do not like the scent of it. It was way too perfuming. Like I said, we love the way the product work on our hair, just not the initial smell of putting it on. Excellent moisturizer for your hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This products STINKS and so will your hair
customer_reviews.text: This product has an overwhelming, nauseating scent of lilacs. If anyone you come near is sensitive to smells, you don't want this stuff. My husband, who has a terrible sense of smell and makes ME sniff the leftovers before he will eat them, noticed it from across the room and said, "You smell terrible. What's going on?" I had to wash my hair twice to get the smell out. Now it's dryer than ever. Hard pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mallon

customer_reviews.title: I love the feel of my blonde hair now!
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolute life saver for my bleached blonde hair. Before this product, my hair was so dry and fried I thought I was going to have to cut it. Then I tried this and it was a total game changer. I also LOVE the smell, and it leaves my hair soft, smooth, and feeling the healthiest it’s ever felt. No other product, other than Olaplex, makes my hair feel this great! I can’t live without it now!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Breis

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and have not even used it yet but I can already tell it is a fake product. The packaging looks a little off and faded in color. I've used this product before and have actually left it in my hair overnight for extra moisturizing and never would have been able to if it smelled as horrible as this. There is no way this is the same product. I remembered I actually liked the smell of it. This one smells way to perfumy. I will try it once but 99.9% sure it is fake! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jules1717

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a refund. Didn’t feel it worked as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Just magic!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works like magic on my hair. Been using this for a couple years. Smells like Michael Kors signature fragrance to me and that is my favorite perfume. I have medium density, 3c/4a, normal porosity, fine all the way to coarse hair strands. I feel this can work for many hair types. Leaves my curls nurished for days!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Hairdresser suggested to purchase for dry type hair. Sulfate free, whatever, not a great product. Very expensive. Recommend Tresseme (sp) they have one that is sulfate free and much better. This is an overpriced product.
customer_reviews.author: msauve

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS FABULOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of THE BEST products I have ever used on my hair!! After using it, it feels like my hair is new, soft and wonderful!! It’s truly a fabulous product and I can highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Traci S.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell,works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product,but now I have to use gluten free products and I don’t know if this has gluten in it so I’m not taking any chances using it til I find out.If anyone know please tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: So soft and healthy hair!
customer_reviews.text: The best hair masks ever! I have bleached blond hair and this is what my hair needs ice a week I let this soak into my hair for ten minutes. It feels great after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A 10 HAIR CONDITIONER IS A 10!
customer_reviews.text: HAVE TRIED THEM ALL, THIS IS THE BEST! BOUGHT ONE FOR MY DAUGHTER TOO AND SAW THAT HER HAIR NEVER LOOKED SO SHINEY. SHE LOVES IT TOO AND SAID HER HAIR IS SO SOFT. WE'RE SOLD ON THIS CONDITIONER! IT'S A 10!"
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Conditioner!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I have long hair and it really helps untangle my hair plus gives it moisture!! I’ve bought so many because all the women in my family loved it! I started giving these for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Libby F.

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this! Is a life saver when ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this! Is a life saver when it comes to washing my daughter's biracial hair. Her hair is curly and puffy it gets tangled real quick. I leave the product for 20 minutes when using after a more trouble hair day. Its expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing.  My feels so soft and hydrated.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. My hair ends up soft and smells so nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with a nickel allergy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for color treated hair. Also recommended for people with a nickel allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this products! Don’t like that is a small package for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tino Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave my daughter a big box for Christmas the look on her face...priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Holohan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair so soft and it smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: anna bertha ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product...Added Chemicals...Very Concerning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fake Product received!!! Very disappointed and very concerned! The product I received had added chemicals that are not in the original item I purchased from the beauty supply. Do not buy! Would give 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: S.D. Deuce

customer_reviews.title: because I have very fine hair, I think doing it any more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I do the hair mask about once a week, because I have very fine hair, I think doing it any more than that would be too much, but after I use this, my hair feels so soft and smooth!! the smell is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kim A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it once a week and leave it in for about 10 minutes while I shower. Hair smells great, and is very soft and shinny.
customer_reviews.author: shannon poverski

customer_reviews.title: Styling and profiling.
customer_reviews.text: Good scent, great hold, makes my hair look bling, bling!
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing.  Leaves hair soft and silky.
customer_reviews.text: I love the It's a 10 product line. I recently lightened my hair and this mask provides a deep moisturizing treatment that leaves my hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I love "It's a 10" products
customer_reviews.text: I love "It's a 10" products. Only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the way this stuff smells. It doesn't smell horrible, it's just really strong.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: This mask smells really good but has horrible ingredients for your hair! Found another one I absolutely love by monat that has helped my hair so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire McNeal

customer_reviews.title: It's a 10......
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It softens my dry hair and makes it manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK this thing is amazing. A little expensive but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Heymanchal Sidoo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The it's a 10 silk is a nice product but I prefer the it's a 10 hair mask.
customer_reviews.author: Riesenszoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much and it is so much cheaper here than at retail stores!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it has made a difference in my hair
customer_reviews.author: Will Rainford

customer_reviews.title: I had better results using a hair mask for half the price
customer_reviews.text: This didn't leave my hair feeling soft at all. I had better results using a hair mask for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a devoted user of all It’s a 10 products and this is not the real thing. At first it smelled real but then smelled like gasoline. Not the real product!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Ness

customer_reviews.title: Best detangler, silkener and softener
customer_reviews.text: Softens and detangles my fine hair which is very prone to tangles and breakage...hard to find a comparable product...this definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I have re-purchased this product several times. My hair is much more silky and less frizzy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Rafer

customer_reviews.title: awesome product helps alot with my tangled mess of a head
customer_reviews.text: leaves my hair feeling silky smooth. I have really bad frizzy hair it hasn't cured me but its helped alot
customer_reviews.author: BPeeples

customer_reviews.title: Love it's a 10
customer_reviews.text: Great product but don't use it everyday if you have fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: kathy kienzle

customer_reviews.title: amazing conditioner for dull damaged hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes hair healthy, love all their products, I condition once a week with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Benevento

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this and use it often my blow out salon thinks it is the best product for my hair which is frizzy and dry damaged from color
customer_reviews.author: Chicago2305

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. I have really long hair and I use it once a week. Keeps the frizz down.
customer_reviews.author: Always Reading

customer_reviews.title: It's a 10!
customer_reviews.text: It's a 10 have outstanding products - good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: Best hair mask I have ever used! Leaves hair weightless and very silky feeling. The scent is pleasant as well. Don't hesitate to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! Makes my hair very soft and shiny! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: When I took it out I noticed that now it looks like a lot less of product in the container
customer_reviews.text: When received it had no seal for it but looked full. When I went to use it, I found a clear circle piece in the middle between layers. When I took it out I noticed that now it looks like a lot less of product in the container. Not sure why this was but now it will not let me load pictures .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly what it said it would do. It smelled great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the hair. Makes it feel so soft and manageable. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This mask is simply amazing! Especially if you hold the mask for 15 minutes, it really does miracles. I have super damages bleached hair, so this is the best solution so far!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and datisfied
customer_reviews.text: could not be happier! very good cream and make the hair soft and hydrated and sleek! worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Sehamnabil

customer_reviews.title: It really is a 10!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My hair felt silky, soft after using as directed. This is my first time using it and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for about a week and not straightening my hair like I usually do so it is too soon for me to know the complete results. I can however say that it is at least as good as the original It's A Ten Miracle Hair Mask with a wonderful smell. For me both of these products are the best for my unruly frizzy hair. So in the future I will order either one depending on price (if they are the same price) I will go with this one because of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Keppinger

customer_reviews.title: The best for dry and treated hair
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for my hair. I also love the scent that stays in your hair even after dry.
customer_reviews.author: posie777

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! After using this product, I saw results instantly. My hair was softer, and silkier! Will definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product it made such a difference in my hair
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Love the silk product line
customer_reviews.text: Love the silk product line. This stuff is like a quick fix for over processed, dry, brittle hair. I was able to get my super bleached and brittle hair that felt like straw with any other conditioner to feel like real, soft, silky hair! My only regret is not finding this stuff sooner. A little goes a long way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderpig

customer_reviews.title: this brand is well known and for great things ! i love many products , JUST NOT THIS ONE !
customer_reviews.text: i am looking to return this item , i used it once , followed the directions to the T and it didn't help my hair in any way , and i do not like the smell and niether does my husband !
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Smell too strong
customer_reviews.text: This does make my hair soft and smooth but not really more than other products. The reason I don't care for this product and will try something else is because the smell is so strong. It's not a bad smell but it's so strong I can smell it all day after my hair has been dried.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great For Damaged Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have really curly long hair. I dyed my hair last summer and it's pretty damaged. The first time I used this product I didn't feel much difference in my hair but I must not have left it in long enough. The second time I used it I decided to leave it in for a few hours with a shower cap covering my hair and my hair came out soooo soft and nice. I will be purchasing this item again and I'll probably end up trying the leave in conditioner to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kieara Haynes

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived without the interior seal and clearly missing a good deal of the product
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with the fact that this product arrived without the interior seal and clearly missing a good deal of the product. For the money I paid, it should absolutely not have arrived that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hufnagle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best conditioner I've ever used...it's worth the price. I love the scent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somehow different than the one I bought at the store?
customer_reviews.author: KatT

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just don't like the scent of this, but product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ptak

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic it's a 10!
customer_reviews.text: Not authentic! I am a professional cosmetologist. I ordered this bc I have been sick and unable to go to the beauty supply. This is not authentic it's a 10. Its is much thinner of a texture and the smell is completely different. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Softens hair without weighing it down.
customer_reviews.text: I got this about three days ago and so far I’m really liking it. It makes my hair soft without weighing it down. After being loyal to another brand for years, I decided to try and save some money and test out other products. I may have found my new favorite conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: CYH

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair light and fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smells good, leaves my hair feeling so light and manageable. I use this every time I wash my hair, and also use the It's a 10 Miracle Conditioner. It's not heavy on my hair, and it still curls.
customer_reviews.author: lady in pink

customer_reviews.title: For the price, does a respectable job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a potential dupe for the Kerastase's Masque Magistral. Does it come close? No. However for the price point, this is a great mask to use once a week and leave on for a good 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Redsilas

customer_reviews.title: Truly a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!!! My hair has been bleached and dyed and I used to use hot tools DAILY! This stuff truly is a miracle! My hair was soft and moisturized and felt brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy T.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for 2+ years directly from the salon. I ordered this product here and it definitely is not the right consistency. It’s much runnier than the authentic product I have bought from the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bush

customer_reviews.title: My favorite conditioner! Leaves hair feeling silky smooth and smells ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite conditioner! Leaves hair feeling silky smooth and smells terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Jen J.

customer_reviews.title: Did not help my hair
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 3 times; once for 30 minutes, second time a week later for one hour and a third time 2 days later for one minute. I ended up with a frizzy mess!!! Absolutely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: California

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for my over bleached hair. Some times I put a little on hair before bed then wash out in the morning. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kme85

customer_reviews.title: This is Fake
customer_reviews.text: The real It's A 10 Hair Mask is a great product. I bought it from a salon and my hair was noticeably silkier. This has absolutely zero effect on my hair. I've never written a product review before, but felt compelled since this is fake product. Buy it from a retail store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gibson

customer_reviews.title: It helps tame the rat's nest!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use the It's a 10 with keratin shampoo and daily conditioner as my hair is very dry and then use this for the frizzy. It helps a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: K A Shaw

customer_reviews.title: ... 10 products but this one is by far the best. I use it as my regular conditioner and ...
customer_reviews.text: obsessed with all Its A 10 products but this one is by far the best. I use it as my regular conditioner and constantly get compliments on how soft my hair is!
customer_reviews.author: cathleens

customer_reviews.title: Soft shiny hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my hair feel and it smells wonderful! Reminds me of jasmine.
customer_reviews.author: Anna N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps my curly hair soft and smelling fantastic. It always makes me happy when my hair looks and smells good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Fordiani

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Best product for silky hair. Ordered many times from this company. Super service.
customer_reviews.author: Admirer of Julia Child

customer_reviews.title: The best for me
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible product I came across. as long as this product exists I will continue to buy it. It does an excellent job on my color-treated hair. it gives shine and moisture for days.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Really makes dry hair feel smooth and helps with detangling

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love how soft my hair feels even from first use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love how soft my hair feels even from first use. However I would recommend keeping the mask on longer than it says on the jar. I usually leave it on for about 7 mins. Also it smells pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Wife read about this in Honolulu newspaper and tried it. She says it's great in humid weather for her curly/fuzzy hair. Expensive but worth it.

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I use the original It's a 10 still of course but I also use this once in while to soften my hair! Does as described!

customer_reviews.title: Omg!! This is a MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the smell of this stuff!! Great product. A must have!!

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Ordered the wrong version of what I needed. Will use. Smells amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used masks from this line, however this one doesn't give me as much detangling and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I love it's a 10 products- it leaves your hair smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love it's a 10 products- it leaves your hair smooth, but has an overpowering floral scent that it awful
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: have tried several different ones and this one was the best.
customer_reviews.text: High quality mask, have tried several different ones and this one was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Place

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this product from a youtube review and decided to try it. I mean, who doesn't want silky hair, right? I did a deep condition under the dryer and plastic cap and it made my 4B/C curly hair easier to detangle. It also smelled great. Some may find it strong, like you literally sprayed a Macy's fragrance in your hair , but I liked it. It;s pricey though, so a little goes a long way. No need to over-saturate with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Use it as my conditioner! My hair is super healthy, I'm obsessed!

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and really works at conditioning without weighing down the hair
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 5th or 6th tub of this... I like it!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Won't use anything else. Only issue was the seal was broken upon delivery. Didn't look like any came out though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this hair mask
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this hair mask!! I didnt think that I'd see a difference after using it for the first time but it left my hair super soft and hydrated and very manageable! After rinsing, I followed up with It's a ten silk express leave in conditioner. I wish I can find it in a lager size. I will definitely be buying this again!! Please try it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: FAKE, doesn't work at all and smells terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Smells Horrible and I am pretty sure its Fake :'( Didn't do anything to my hair at all. DO NOT BUY THIS FROM AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Rajoshi Biswas

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine dry hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine dry hair. I love this line; conditions really well. I use the leave in spray afterwards which helps with the dryness. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: VAM

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product for my mom and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mom and she loves it, it doesnt weight down your hair and it helps it feeling great
customer_reviews.author: tanya calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It made my hair feel so soft and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: one star for the great scent. I'm very disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did not do as it says. Do not shines, one star for the great scent. I'm very disappointed in this purchase, I waisted my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: I don't care much for this product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product twice since my purchase and i can say that i am hoping to like it more in the future bc right now i don't care much for this purchase which really does sadden me bc its sort of a high end product. Although its not the most expensive I've ever paid for hair products for me & my mom but it is one of the most expensive i have paid and not cared much for. I have many products but no I'm really not impressed with this at all
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shunda K

product_meta.title: It's a 10 Haircare Silk Express Miracle Silk Hair Mask, 8 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: ENHANCE your hair by detangling and defrizzing as product nourishes your hair and reveals shine
CREATE ultra silky smooth hair while sealing in moisture
IMPROVE elasticity and natural body of your hair
STRENGTHEN and fortify with deep conditioning properties
PROTECT hair with color protectant formula
